Q.1. In a certain code, RAID is written as %#*$, RIPE is written as % * @ . How is DEAR written up in that code?
Q.2. In a certain code, MODERN is written as 5%38#@ and WIN is written as 6@. How is RIDE Written in that code?
Q.3. In a certain code, ROPE is written as %57$, DOUBT is written as 35#8* and LIVE is written as @24$. How is TROUBLE written in that code?
Q.4. In a certain code, MEAN is written as $57* and DOME is written as 93$5. How is MOAN written in that code?
Q.5. In a certain code, 'BOY' is written as '$*' and 'HOUR' is written as @*O. How is 'RUBY' written in that code?
Q.6. In a certain code, DOWN is written as 5@9# and NAME is written as #6%3. How would MODE be written in that code?
